metadata.Title: CVE-2023-32725 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The website configured in the URL widget will receive a session cookie whentesting or executing scheduled reports. The received session cookie canthen be used to access the frontend as the particular user.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
